verses.verse: There <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H347>Job;<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and one that <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5493>eschewed<s%> <S%H4480>evil.<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
And there were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

His <S%H4735>substance<s%> also <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> she <S%H860>asses,<s%> and a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5657>household;<s%> so that <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>feasted<s%> <S%H4960><s%> in their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3117>day;<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H269>sisters<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them.

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4960>feasting<s%> were gone <S%H5362>about,<s%> that <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them, and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them <S%H3605>all:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It may <S%H194>be<s%> that my <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H1288>cursed<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts.<s%> <S%H3602>Thus<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to present <S%H3320>themselves<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H4480>Whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou? Then <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> From going to and <S%H4480>fro<s%> <S%H7751><s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and from walking up and <S%H4480>down<s%> <S%H1980><s%> in it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> Hast thou <S%H7760>considered<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like <S%H3644>him<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> one that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5493>escheweth<s%> <S%H4480>evil?<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
Then <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Doth <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H2600>naught?<s%>

Hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> made a <S%H7753>hedge<s%> <S%H1157>about<s%> him, and <S%H1157>about<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1157>about<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath on every <S%H4480>side?<s%> <S%H5439><s%> thou hast <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and his <S%H4735>substance<s%> is <S%H6555>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

But <S%H199><s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath, <S%H518>and<s%> he will <S%H1288>curse<s%> thee <S%H5921>to<s%> thy <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath is in thy <S%H3027>power;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> himself put not <S%H408>forth<s%> <S%H7971><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%> So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> when his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1241>oxen<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2790>plowing,<s%> and the <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H3027><s%> them:

And the <S%H7614>Sabeans<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon them, and took them <S%H3947>away;<s%> yea, they have <S%H5221>slain<s%> the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While <S%H2088>he<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H2088>another,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and hath burned <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H5288>servants,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> them; and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While <S%H2088>he<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H2088>another,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> out <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>bands,<s%> and <S%H6584>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and have carried them <S%H3947>away,<s%> yea, and <S%H5221>slain<s%> the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While <S%H2088>he<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H2088>another,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5060>smote<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they are <S%H4191>dead;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7167>rent<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4598>mantle,<s%> and <S%H1494>shaved<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6174>Naked<s%> came I <S%H3318>out<s%> of my mother's <S%H4480>womb,<s%> <S%H990><s%> <S%H517><s%> and <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall I <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H8033>thither:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath taken <S%H3947>away;<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
In <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>charged<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8604>foolishly.<s%>
